src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Yes , I do . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . [MASK] [end] RC : Thank you , bye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . ARI : No . [MASK] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . [MASK] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate .
